subject: Steroids
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Mr. Francis was the Canadian coach who was unapologetic about his athletes’ use of performance-enhancing drugs, forcing Olympic officials to confront the problem.
snippet: Mr. Francis was the Canadian coach who was unapologetic about his athletes’ use of performance-enhancing drugs, forcing Olympic officials to confront the problem.
